content.html:
Root-Checking aims at validating the quality of the rooting worksystem.

Quality of a root is estimated on the exactitude of the proposed URLs correlating a “fact”. If a URL proposes different numeric values or a different interpretation of the same fact, it must be rejected.

If a proposed URL violates the chart specified for moderating content, it should also be rejected.

Every proposed URL for every “fact” must be accepted or rejected through a series of votes.

As for all other operations on Exorde, a small stake in EXD will be deducted from your virtual wallet to avoid spamming and enforce quality.

Voting against a consensus will result in a penalty, whereas voting with the consensus will result in a reward.
